text: ni:Sanka nukasanamam rahya te loko, je'o'e allaha sathe mulakata karavane jutha samajyum, ahim sudhi ke te nakki karela samaya te'o para avi pahoncase, kahese ke aphasosa che amari susti para, je a vise tha'i, ane sthiti evi thase ke te'o potani pitha para bhara uthavela hase, sari rite sambhali lo ke, kharaba hase te vastu jeno bhara te'o uthavase
